data.text: @MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek So brave, strong and powerful ❤️💪🏻
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek You both look fantastic! Love your dresses!
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek You look beautiful, Mira. Ashley looks pretty good, too.
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek Thank you and your “sisters” being so brave.
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek And I love them all for what they provide us all, everyday! Everyhour! #metoo
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek You two ladies look very beautiful wish I could be half as beautiful as you two.

@Paul_Berney @MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek It's important to know that Winestein assaulted more women than just 'Hollywood".  98 % of his victims worked Hollwood, but not all.  He got me in Rome in 1980,  and now it makes me sick to learn that while in Cannes, France with my son,H.W. was there again hurting Asia Argento.
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek One day I hope all the Weinstein survivors get together.

@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek You all looked beautiful! I enjoyed the Christmas movie you were in this past Christmas. One of my favorites. They kept my mood up despite this horrible Trump stink we are going through.
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek All of Hollywood new about Weinstein and did nothing for years ! Hypocrites all of you !
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek You all looked great together!
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek I’d get your dad to “whack” him
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek Everyone should be proud of how you are standing up and speaking out. Your example will inspire many women!
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek Good company
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek Love your dress!!!
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek Happy #iwd2018 https://t.co/G2hBv3jpYv
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek I hope you sue the daylights out of Mirimax.   They cost you lots of money as well as suffering and you'll win

@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek The Sciorra story in unreal- not easily shocked but I was shocked.  One of the most disturbing scenes I know in all of film is Danny Aeillo's character beating her in Jungle Fever, and I kept thinking of that.
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek It was lovely seeing you all together, you're some of the finest stars in Hollywood. I've total love and respect for you all. ❤
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek I hope this is the photo the use in the history books or women’s studies classes with the caption “they persevered and were victorious”.
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek Well done Momma 👍👍👍👍👍👍👍 https://t.co/GvSggjQMN6
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek Wonder who's pushing their careers now
@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek Hurrah for strong women!!!
@MiraSorvino @yashar @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek Great job!

@MiraSorvino @AshleyJudd @AnnabellSciorra @salmahayek What a great picture!  Really proud of you and your dedication to this movement. You voice will go down in history as a real turning point for women!
